issue.title: [CF 806] Regarding damage shields + incoming heals
issue.body:
Add conditions to check unit damage shield amount and incoming heal amount.

Add a buff equiv that includes the major player damage shields (PW:S, ice barrier, AMS, etc.)


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #806 | Raw
